mapper.select: /* B_Broadcast.xml - callBroadcastTotal */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_broadcast_total(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
/* B_Broadcast.xml - callBroadcastPlatform */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_broadcast_total(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
/* B_Broadcast.xml - callBroadcastLive */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_broadcast_live(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
/* B_Broadcast.xml - callBroadcastList */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_broadcast_gift(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
/* B_Broadcast.xml - callBroadcastList */ call rd_admin.sp_admin_stat_broadcast_total(#{data, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ret, mode=OUT, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ext, mode=OUT, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
